Package parkeersimulator.controller

Class Simulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • parkeersimulator.framework.Controller
      • parkeersimulator.controller.Simulator
  • public class Simulator
extends Controller
    This class represents the simulation itself.

    It contains the models: Clock. It contains the views: CarPark, TopBar, CarParkFloor and CarParkView.

    This class also handles if the simulation is currently running or is halted.

    Version:
    28.01.2019.

        private void run​(CarParkControls controls,
                 int ticks)
        Runs the simulation for the specified amount of ticks.
        Parameters:
        controls - the controls for the carPark.
        ticks - the total amount of ticks for the simulation to run.

      • tick
